line.comment: * Returns one table containing two tables 'production' and 'consumption' ($ware as key, int as value).
* Mordan3 - Add any energy produced by Outposts with Solar panel perk.
* Add-Ons 1.2: Fix a bug showing 0 waste produced by outposts. Need to add waste produced by Outposts. Also added materials produced by legendary terraforming effects.
* $ecellCount, waste, and any goods produced by legendary terraforming effects get added to stations every "mayhem_cycleConsumption" every 600 seconds (10 minutes) (id=8 in 9972)
* Add total of all outposts producing energy to the $production total calculated above.
* retrieve total amount of ECells produced via the Outposts with the Solar Panels perk PER HOUR.
* Amount added to this station every cycle
* Add-Ons 1.2: Retrieve total amount of waste produced via the Outposts.
* Add-Ons 1.2: Legendary effects. Base values: 40 tela/min, 25 rastar/min, 60 ore/min, 60 silicon/min

sval.val: Returns one table containing two tables 'production' and 'consumption' ($ware as key, int as value).
Mordan3 - Add any energy produced by Outposts with Solar panel perk.
Add-Ons 1.2: Fix a bug showing 0 waste produced by outposts. Need to add waste produced by Outposts. Also added materials produced by legendary terraforming effects.
$ecellCount, waste, and any goods produced by legendary terraforming effects get added to stations every "mayhem_cycleConsumption" every 600 seconds (10 minutes) (id=8 in 9972)
Add total of all outposts producing energy to the $production total calculated above.
retrieve total amount of ECells produced via the Outposts with the Solar Panels perk PER HOUR.
Amount added to this station every cycle
Add-Ons 1.2: Retrieve total amount of waste produced via the Outposts.
Add-Ons 1.2: Legendary effects. Base values: 40 tela/min, 25 rastar/min, 60 ore/min, 60 silicon/min
